verses.verse: מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> mas-Kil, Maschil לְאֵיתָ֥ן <WH387> le-'ei-Tan of Ethan הָֽאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <WH250> Ha-'ez-ra-Chi. the Ezrahite חַֽסְדֵ֣י <WH2617> chas-Dei of the mercies יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> o-Lam for ever אָשִׁ֑ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah; I will sing לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> le-Dor to all וָדֹ֓ר׀ <WH1755> va-Dor generations אוֹדִ֖יעַ <WH3045> o-Di-a' will I make known אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <WH530> 'e-mu-na-te-Cha thy faithfulness בְּפִֽי׃ <WH6310> be-Fi. with my mouth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, For I have said ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> o-lom for ever חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed Mercy יִבָּנֶ֑ה <WH1129> yib-ba-Neh; shall be built up שָׁמַ֓יִם׀ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim in the very heavens תָּכִ֖ן <WH3559> ta-Chin shalt thou establish אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <WH530> 'e-mu-na-te-Cha thy faithfulness בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

כָּרַ֣תִּֽי <WH3772> ka-Rat-ti I have made בְ֭רִית <WH1285> Ve-rit a covenant לִבְחִירִ֑י <WH972> liv-chi-Ri; with my chosen נִ֝שְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ti, I have sworn לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid unto David עַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH5650> 'av-Di. my servant

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> o-lom ever אָכִ֣ין <WH3559> 'a-Chin will I establish זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> zar-'E-cha; Thy seed וּבָנִ֨יתִי <WH1129> u-va-Ni-ti and build up לְדֹר־ <WH1755> le-dor- to all וָד֖וֹר <WH1755> va-Dor generations כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <WH3678> kis-'a-Cha thy throne סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

וְי֘וֹד֤וּ <WH3034> ve-Yo-Du shall praise שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim And the heavens פִּלְאֲךָ֣ <WH6382> pil-'a-Cha thy wonders יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; O LORD אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> 'e-mu-na-te-cha, thy faithfulness בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> bik-Hal also in the congregation קְדֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH6918> ke-do-Shim. of the saints

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For מִ֣י <WH4310> mi who בַ֭שַּׁחַק <WH7834> Vash-sha-chak For who in the heaven יַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <WH6186> ya-'a-Roch can be compared לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD יִדְמֶ֥ה <WH1819> yid-Meh can be likened לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> biv-Nei afflicted אֵלִים׃ <WH410> 'e-lim of the mighty

אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el God נַ֭עֲרָץ <WH6206> Na-'a-rotz to be feared בְּסוֹד־ <WH5475> be-sod- in the assembly קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> ke-do-Shim of the saints רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> rab-Bah; is greatly וְ֝נוֹרָ֗א <WH3372> ve-no-Ra, and to be had in reverence עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all סְבִיבָֽיו׃ <WH5439> se-vi-Vav. of all [them that are] about

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-Lo-Hei God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- who כָֽמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> cha-Mo-cha is like חֲסִ֥ין׀ <WH2626> cha-Sin who [is] a strong יָ֑הּ <WH3050> Yah; LORD וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> ve-'e-mu-na-te-cha, like unto thee;or to thy faithfulness סְבִיבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5439> se-vi-vo-Tei-cha. round about

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You מ֭וֹשֵׁל <WH4910> Moo-shel Thou rulest בְּגֵא֣וּת <WH1348> be-ge-'Ut the raging הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hai-Yam; of the sea בְּשׂ֥וֹא <WH7721> be-So thereof arise גַ֝לָּ֗יו <WH1530> gal-Lav, when the waves אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You תְשַׁבְּחֵֽם׃ <WH7623> te-shab-be-Chem. thou stillest

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah Yourself דִכִּ֣אתָ <WH1792> dik-Ki-ta in pieces כֶחָלָ֣ל <WH2491> che-cha-Lal as one that is slain רָ֑הַב <WH7294> Ra-hav; Rahab בִּזְר֥וֹעַ <WH2220> biz-Ro-a' arm עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <WH5797> 'uz-ze-cha, with thy strong פִּזַּ֥רְתָּ <WH6340> piz-Zar-ta thou hast scattered אוֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> 'oy-Vei-cha. thine enemies

לְךָ֣ le-Cha שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma-yim The heavens אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also לְךָ֥ le-Cha אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; [are] thine the earth תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> te-Vel also [is] thine [as for] the world וּ֝מְלֹאָ֗הּ <WH4393> u-me-lo-'Ah, and the fulness אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יְסַדְתָּֽם׃ <WH3245> ye-sad-Tam. thereof thou hast founded

צָפ֣וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon The north וְ֭יָמִין <WH3225> Ve-ya-min and the south אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You בְרָאתָ֑ם <WH1254> ve-ra-Tam; thou hast created תָּב֥וֹר <WH8396> ta-Vor them Tabor וְ֝חֶרְמ֗וֹן <WH2768> ve-cher-Mon, and Hermon בְּשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> be-shim-Cha in thy name יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> ye-ran-Ne-nu. shall rejoice

לְךָ֣ le-Cha זְ֭רוֹעַ <WH2220> Ze-ro-a' arm עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- have a גְּבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> ge-vu-Rah; Thou hast a mighty תָּעֹ֥ז <WH5810> ta-'Oz strong יָ֝דְךָ֗ <WH3027> ya-de-cha, is thy hand תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> ta-Rum [and] high יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-Ne-cha. is thy right hand

צֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek Justice וּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <WH4941> U-mish-pot and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <WH4349> me-Chon [are] the habitation כִּסְאֶ֑ךָ <WH3678> kis-'E-cha; of thy throne חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met, and truth יְֽקַדְּמ֥וּ <WH6923> ye-kad-de-Mu shall go פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> fa-Nei-cha. before thy face

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> 'ash-Rei Blessed הָ֭עָם <WH5971> Ha-'om [is] the people יוֹדְעֵ֣י <WH3045> yod-'Ei that know תְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah; the joyful sound יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD בְּֽאוֹר־ <WH216> be-'or- in the light פָּנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha of thy countenance יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <WH1980> ye-hal-le-Chun. they shall walk

בְּ֭שִׁמְךָ <WH8034> Be-shim-cha In thy name יְגִיל֣וּן <WH1523> ye-gi-Lun shall they rejoice כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; all the day וּבְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> u-ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha and in thy righteousness יָרֽוּמוּ׃ <WH7311> ya-Ru-mu. shall they be exalted

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תִפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> tif-'E-ret For thou [art] the glory עֻזָּ֣מוֹ <WH5797> 'uz-Za-mov of their strength אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; and by וּ֝בִרְצֹנְךָ֗ <WH7522> u-vir-tzo-ne-cha, and in thy favour; תָּרִים ta-rim כתָּר֥וּם <WH7311> ta-Rum bring up קקַרְנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH7161> kar-Ne-nu. our horn

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD מָֽגִנֵּ֑נוּ <WH4043> ma-gin-Ne-nu; [is] our defence וְלִקְד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> ve-lik-Doosh and the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מַלְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH4428> mal-Ke-nu. [is] our king

אָ֤ז <WH227> 'az Once דִּבַּ֥רְתָּֽ־ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ta- Then thou spakest בְחָ֡זוֹן <WH2377> ve-Cha-zon in vision לַֽחֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <WH2623> la-cha-si-Dei-cha, to thy holy one וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer, and saidst שִׁוִּ֣יתִי <WH7737> shiv-Vi-ti I have laid עֵ֭זֶר <WH5828> 'E-zer help עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto גִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor; upon [one that is] mighty הֲרִימ֖וֹתִי <WH7311> ha-ri-Mo-ti I have exalted בָח֣וּר <WH970> va-Chur young מֵעָֽם׃ <WH5971> me-'Am. out of the people

מָ֭צָאתִי <WH4672> Ma-tza-ti I have found דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> da-Vid David עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> 'av-Di; my servant בְּשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> be-She-men oil קָדְשִׁ֣י <WH6944> kod-shi with my holy מְשַׁחְתִּֽיו׃ <WH4886> me-shach-Tiv. have I anointed

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom יָ֭דִי <WH3027> Ya-di With whom my hand תִּכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> tik-Kon shall be established עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo; with אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also זְרוֹעִ֥י <WH2220> ze-ro-'I mine arm תְאַמְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH553> te-'am-me-Tzen-nu. also shall strengthen

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יַשִּׁ֣א <WH5378> yash-Shi shall not exact אוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> o-Yev The enemy בּ֑וֹ bo; וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- upon him nor the son עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <WH5766> 'av-Lah, of wickedness לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יְעַנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH6031> ye-'an-Nen-nu. afflict

וְכַתּוֹתִ֣י <WH3807> ve-chat-to-Ti And I will beat down מִפָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> mip-pa-Nav before his face צָרָ֑יו <WH6862> tza-Rav; his foes וּמְשַׂנְאָ֥יו <WH8130> u-me-san-'Av them that hate אֶגּֽוֹף׃ <WH5062> eg-Gof. and plague

וֶֽאֶֽמוּנָתִ֣י <WH530> ve-'e-mu-na-Ti But my faithfulness וְחַסְדִּ֣י <WH2617> ve-chas-Di and my mercy עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo; and in וּ֝בִשְׁמִ֗י <WH8034> u-vish-Mi, [shall be] with him and in my name תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> ta-Rum be exalted קַרְנֽוֹ׃ <WH7161> kar-No. shall his horn

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> ve-sam-Ti I will set בַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> vai-Yam also in the sea יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do; his hand וּֽבַנְּהָר֥וֹת <WH5104> u-van-ne-ha-Rot in the rivers יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-No. and his right hand

ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu He יִ֭קְרָאֵנִי <WH7121> Yik-ra-'e-ni He shall cry אָ֣בִי <WH1> 'A-vi unto me Thou [art] my father אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you אֵ֝לִ֗י <WH410> 'e-Li, my God וְצ֣וּר <WH6697> ve-Tzur and the rock יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Ti. of my salvation

אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also אָ֭נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor him [my] firstborn אֶתְּנֵ֑הוּ <WH5414> 'et-te-Ne-hu; Also I will make עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, higher לְמַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> le-mal-chei- than the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth

לְ֭עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam, for him for evermore; אֶשְׁמֹור־ 'esh-mor- כאֶשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> 'esh-mor- will keep ל֣וֹ <WH8104> lo will I keep קחַסְדִּ֑י <WH2617> chas-Di; My mercy וּ֝בְרִיתִ֗י <WH1285> u-ve-ri-Ti, and my covenant נֶאֱמֶ֥נֶת <WH539> ne-'e-Me-net shall stand fast לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> ve-sam-Ti also will I make לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> la-'Ad [to endure] for ever זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> zar-'O; His seed וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ <WH3678> ve-chis-'O, and his throne כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> ki-Mei as the days שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If יַֽעַזְב֣וּ <WH5800> ya-'az-Vu forsake בָ֭נָיו <WH1121> Va-nav If his children תּוֹרָתִ֑י <WH8451> to-ra-Ti; my law וּ֝בְמִשְׁפָּטַ֗י <WH4941> u-ve-mish-pa-Tai, not in my judgments לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יֵלֵכֽוּן׃ <WH1980> ye-le-Chun. walk

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If חֻקֹּתַ֥י <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes יְחַלֵּ֑לוּ <WH2490> ye-chal-Le-lu; If they break וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <WH4687> u-mitz-vo-Tai, not my commandments לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ <WH8104> yish-Mo-ru. and keep

וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <WH6485> u-fa-kad-Ti Then will I visit בְשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> ve-She-vet with the rod פִּשְׁעָ֑ם <WH6588> pish-'Am; their transgression וּבִנְגָעִ֥ים <WH5061> u-vin-ga-'Im with stripes עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nam. and their iniquity

וְ֭חַסְדִּי <WH2617> Ve-chas-di Nevertheless my lovingkindness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor אָפִ֣יר <WH6331> 'a-Fir will I not utterly take מֵֽעִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> me-'im-Mo; with וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor אֲ֝שַׁקֵּ֗ר <WH8266> 'a-shak-Ker, to fail בֶּאֱמוּנָתִֽי׃ <WH530> be-'e-mu-na-Ti. from him nor suffer my faithfulness

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor אֲחַלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> 'a-chal-Lel will I not break בְּרִיתִ֑י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti; My covenant וּמוֹצָ֥א <WH4161> u-mo-Tza the thing that is gone out שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <WH8193> fa-Tai, of my lips לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor אֲשַׁנֶּֽה׃ <WH8138> 'a-shan-Neh. nor alter

אַ֭חַת <WH259> 'A-chat Once נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ti have I sworn בְקָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> ve-ka-de-Shi; by my holiness אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid unto David אֲכַזֵּֽב׃ <WH3576> 'a-chaz-Zev. that I will not lie

זַ֭רְעוֹ <WH2233> zar-'o His seed לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam shall endure for ever יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh; shall endure וְכִסְא֖וֹ <WH3678> ve-chis-'O and his throne כַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> chash-She-mesh as the sun נֶגְדִּֽי׃ <WH5048> neg-Di. before

כְּ֭יָרֵחַ <WH3394> Ke-ya-re-ach as the moon יִכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> yik-Kon It shall be established עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; for ever וְעֵ֥ד <WH5707> ve-'Ed witness בַּ֝שַּׁ֗חַק <WH7834> bash-Sha-chak, in heaven נֶאֱמָ֥ן <WH539> ne-'e-Man and [as] a faithful סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah You זָ֭נַחְתָּ <WH2186> Za-nach-ta But thou hast cast off וַתִּמְאָ֑ס <WH3988> vat-tim-'As; and abhorred הִ֝תְעַבַּ֗רְתָּ <WH5674> hit-'ab-Bar-ta, thou hast been wroth עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- against מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> me-shi-Che-cha. with thine anointed
